TFTCG Aequitas Draft FAQ
FAQ / Wave 1 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Peace Through Tyranny

  1. If I play Peace Through Tyranny and my opponent has a Secret Action out, does that Secret Action scrap at the end of my current turn or does it stay out through my second turn? [Source: Aequitas]
    It scraps at the end of your current turn and is not present for your second turn.
